title: Raymundo Was SNUBBED By A Celebrity + Bobby Hosts A Commercial Competition + Amy Vs. Lunchbox Returns!
itunes:title: Raymundo Was SNUBBED By A Celebrity + Bobby Hosts A Commercial Competition + Amy Vs. Lunchbox Returns!
description:
Raymundo tells us what celebrity snubbed him at the mall when he ran into them randomly. We get to the bottom of who it was and if we consider it a snub or not. Bobby challenges all the members of the show to a 30 second commercial reading contest. The winner gets some cash and a recommendation to our sales team for more work doing commercials! We bring back our game Amy vs. Lunchbox where they each try to answer questions that the other person would know the answer to.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
